sentence: rotate the right purple block by 30 degrees and align it with the left side of the foremost red block
pick up the red block in the front center and place it on the purple block next to it
pick up the red block behind the front purple block and place it on the left side of the purple block
rotate the rearmost red block by 45 degrees and align it with the right side of the first purple block you moved
rotate the front yellow block by 45 degrees and align it with the left side of the second red block you moved
